name: TalentSpotter
slogan: Talent Disruptor combining Ml, Psychometrics and more
description: gamified next level talent platform to accelerate company growth and enhance and strengthen candidate experience

team.title: Co-Founder
team.name: Andy Young
team.bioHtml: Founder @TalentSpotter, @XPULSE

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer - Tech Wizard
jobs.description:
This is a ground-floor opportunity to get into a fast growth talent tech firm within East London. We are seeking a enthusiastic and well versed Full stack developer who knows their way around the software development world and can act as both Lead Developer and give direction to other FSD.s and Ui/UX guys/gals.

The MVP build is exciting part of the journey for this ambitious company. The team is mostly based in the UK currently however we are very open to working with remote based talent. 

In the early stages we are seeking to speak to those people who want a slice of the pie and wish to be part of a talent tech revolution - we have very strong links into Academia and are already undertaking some groundbreaking research. If you want to join a passionate and exciting journey as a Full Stack Developer doing good then look no further.

jobs.title: CTO - TECHNICAL CO-FOUNDER
jobs.description:
CTO – Technical Co-Founder

The role:
 
This role represents a unique opportunity to join our London based start-up - with a global footprint – you will be joining a growing team well on their way to building an MVP.
 
Currently in stealth mode, the platform and future apps will be disrupting the talent industry in a fresh and exciting way,
 
The team is currently made up of a mix of full-time and remote staff – most of the development work is being done offshore so experience of managing remote developers (ideally in open-source environment) is key as their may be a requirement to roll up the sleeves and do some coding/code-breaking from time to time to ensure all development is up to par.
 
Your background has likely been in software engineering or working up from being a full-stack developer – you will have a natural curiosity of all things new and understand how to take advantage of new technology such as AI. As our business will be rich in data a background in data science may also be of use.
 
Our Mission:

Our mission to deliver a richer, fairer, more insightful recruitment process empowering both candidates and clients in their decision making.
 
We do this by introducing new levels of  transparency into the talent selection process.
Through soft skill and personality tests – we conduct gamifiied psychometric assessment and apply human-centric AI and technical testing to on-board candidates continuously applying our skills  assessment algorithm. 
 
 
Our Values:
 
 
Our organisation is built on several core values which aid in our daily decision making. These values include:

Transparency 
Innovation
Team Work 
Reliability 

As a front-runner in the field of talent-tech we are passionate about positive disruption - making a change for the better, 

 Why Us?
 
After investing considerable time and effort over the past few months, we are poised to launch an innovative platform. We have bought together a number of thought leaders industry experts and forward thinkers from a variety of backgrounds to tackle incredible complex challenges. We are seeking a leader in the technology field to drive our future success.
As we onboard and retain our initial clients, the roadmap sees us investing heavily in further developing our algorithms.
You will join us on an exciting time in our journey as we head towards a seed investment round.

With a proven track record in the talent space and a unique product offering that blends cutting edge technology and neuroscience we will be focusing on a number of fast-growth markets. We are curating a heavy hitting team of illustrious professionals to deliver a unique, value-adding platform and a rich customer experience. 
 
 
The Deal:
 
For the CTO – co-founder this role will requires a visionary with huge confidence in their capability to join the team initially a sweat equity role. Equity will be offered in the realms of 5-7% for the right candidate.
As we raise seed funds and and move into full-time mode, the CTO role will be offered a competitive salary in house (with the sweat equity) your role being to deliver our technological vision and to drive development into the future.
